snippet.title: Gorgonia: A Gorgon's Tragedy - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gorgonia is an RPG Maker horror game that reimagines the Gorgons’ origin story, offering a fresh perspective on ancient myth. Step into the role of Medyuu, a beautiful lamia with unsettling secrets. Her sisters seem to glimpse something different in her—a haunting gaze that pulls her into a path of strange encounters and eerie discoveries.

Will Medyuu find peace or despair? Embark on this journey to discover the true depths of her story!

Gorgonia is also a spin-off of Sirensia, a story-driven horror RPG featuring Medyuu (the Protagonist of Gorgonia). Initially planned as part of Sirensia, it evolved into a standalone experience, surprisingly releasing before Sirensia itself (laughs)!

Check out the game here!
https://daybloomproject.itch.io/gorgonia
